title: Arabic 20
text: My claim on thee is great, it cannot be forgotten. My grace to thee is plenteous, it cannot be veiled. My love has made in thee its home, it cannot be concealed. My light is manifest to thee, it cannot be obscured.
teaser: My claim on thee is great...

prev.title: Arabic 19
prev.exhort: O SON OF THE WONDROUS VISION!
prev.text: I have breathed within thee a breath of My own Spirit, that thou mayest be My lover. Why hast thou forsaken Me and sought a beloved other than Me?

next.title: Arabic 21
next.text: Upon the tree of effulgent glory I have hung for thee the choicest fruits, wherefore hast thou turned away and contented thyself with that which is less good? Return then unto that which is better for thee in the realm on high.
next.teaser: Upon the tree of effulgent glory...
